#| label: death-counter-realtime
#| fig-cap: "Real-Time Global Death Counter"
#| echo: false

from IPython.display import HTML, display

# Global death statistics (per second)
DEATHS_PER_SECOND = 1.8  # Total global deaths
DISEASE_DEATHS_PER_SECOND = 1.5  # Deaths from disease
PREVENTABLE_DEATHS_PER_SECOND = 0.9  # Preventable deaths
CHILD_DEATHS_PER_SECOND = 0.17  # Children under 5

def create_death_counter():
    """Create an interactive real-time death counter widget"""
    html = """
    <div style="background: #000; color: #0F0; padding: 40px; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; text-align: center; border: 8px solid #0F0; margin: 20px 0;">
        <h2 style="color: #0F0; font-size: 48px; margin-bottom: 30px; font-weight: bold;">GLOBAL DEATH MONITOR</h2>
        <div id="death-counter" style="font-size: 24px; line-height: 2;">
            <div>Since you opened this page: <span id="total" style="color: #FF0000; font-size: 36px; font-weight: bold;">0</span> deaths</div>
            <div>From disease: <span id="disease" style="color: #FFA500; font-size: 30px;">0</span></div>
            <div>Were preventable: <span id="preventable" style="color: #FFFF00; font-size: 30px;">0</span></div>
            <div>Children under 5: <span id="children" style="color: #FF69B4; font-size: 30px;">0</span></div>
        </div>
        <div style="margin-top: 30px; font-size: 18px; color: #888;">
            That's 3 human beings per second. Forever. Until we fix this.
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
    let startTime = Date.now();

    function updateCounter() {
        let elapsed = (Date.now() - startTime) / 1000;
        document.getElementById('total').textContent = Math.floor(elapsed * 1.8);
        document.getElementById('disease').textContent = Math.floor(elapsed * 1.5);
        document.getElementById('preventable').textContent = Math.floor(elapsed * 0.9);
        document.getElementById('children').textContent = Math.floor(elapsed * 0.17);
    }

    setInterval(updateCounter, 100);
    </script>
    """
    return HTML(html)

# Display the counter
display(create_death_counter())

# Also print static statistics for non-interactive viewing

print(f"â€¢ Preventable deaths: {PREVENTABLE_DEATHS_PER_SECOND}")
print(f"â€¢ Children under 5: {CHILD_DEATHS_PER_SECOND}")
